name: create_price
description:
This tool will create a price in Stripe. If a product has not already been specified, a product should be created first.

It takes three arguments:
- product (str): The ID of the product to create the price for.
- unit_amount (int): The unit amount of the price in currency minor units, e.g. cents for USD and yen for JPY.
- currency (str): The currency of the price.

product.description: The ID of the product to create the price for.

unit_amount.description: The unit amount of the price in cents.

recurring.description: The recurring components of a price such as its interval.

interval.description: Specifies billing frequency. Either day, week, month or year.

interval_count.description: The number of intervals between subscription billings. For example, interval=month and interval_count=3 bills every 3 months. Maximum of three years interval allowed (3 years, 36 months, or 156 weeks).
